pages.text: As part of basic settler training, you were taught how to make a sieve and sift various materials for precious materials.$(br2) Regrettably, there's no metal even in the dirt and gravel! What there is, however, might be of greater use. Fertilizer, rare materials, and even mycelium spores are plenty within the ground!
Some of the most interesting drops are redstone and glowstone. The latter can make light, and the former has strange conductive properties. Perhaps it can be used to make various machinery?
Just to let you know, you can only use one sieve at a time, and adjacent sieves won't be sifted at the same time.
